item.deleteDescription: When you delete this item it cannot be recovered.

help.subtitle: Search help
help.tip3: The type you are searching for might not have been added yet

templates.query: We are sorry, there are no results for “{{query}}”

placeholders.item: Select an item to view its properties

placeholders.name: Node name
placeholders.description: Additional information about this node can be supplied here.

disabled.aspect: It is not possible to change the aspect of the current type. We recommend that you select a different type with the desired aspect.

processing.error: An error occurred during node submission

dialog.description: The attributes listed below are predefined and can be reused across multiple nodes.

login.title: Login
login.error: Incorrect username, password or authentication code.

register.title: Register
register.description: Create an account to collaborate with your organization!
register.error: An error occurred when trying to create your user.

finalize.verificationDescription: You're almost there! We have sent you an email to verify your registration. Just click on the link in that email to complete your signup. If you don't see it, you may need to check your spam folder.
finalize.mfaDescription: Scan the QR code below in your authenticator app of choice. The code shown in the app can then be used during login.

notFound.title: Oops!
notFound.subtitle: We can't seem to find the page you're looking for.
